EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum heat value in the heatmap?
EVJ.A: The global maximum heat value is {0.93}.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum heat value in the heatmap?
EVJ.A: The global minimum heat value is {0.21}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum heat value of label Basketball on the x-axis?
EVJ.A: The maximum heat value of Basketball on the x-axis is {0.93}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum heat value of label Streaming on the x-axis?

SC.Q: What is the average heat value for label Merchandise on the y-axis?
SC.A: The average heat value for Merchandise on the y-axis is {0.66}.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Tennis and Merchandise or the cell corresponding to Music and Revenue?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Music} and {Revenue} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Basketball and Attendance or the cell corresponding to Music and Attendance?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Basketball} and {Attendance} has a higher heat value.

MSR.Q: In the heatmap, what are the row and column labels for all cells whose heat values fall within the range of 0.71 to 0.89?
MSR.A: The cells are: {(Events, Fan Engagement), (Streaming, Fan Engagement), (Football, Merchandise), (Music, Merchandise), (Football, Royalties), (Music, Royalties), (Events, Social Media), (Streaming, Social Media)}.
